description: Manages interface specific VPN configuration of HUAWEI CloudEngine switches.

state.description: Manage the state of the resource.

vrf.description: VPN instance, the length of vrf name is 1 ~ 31, i.e. "test", but can not be C(_public_).

vpn_interface.description: An interface that can binding VPN instance, i.e. 40GE1/0/22, Vlanif10. Must be fully qualified interface name. Interface types, such as 10GE, 40GE, 100GE, LoopBack, MEth, Tunnel, Vlanif....
